SELECT FROM user WHERE 1 = 1
AND username = #{user.username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AND birthday = #{user.birthday,jdbcType=BIGINT},
AND sex = #{user.sex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
AND isDelete = #{user.isdelete,jdbcType=INTEGER},
AND telephone = #{user.telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AND address = #{user.address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AND idNumber = #{user.idnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

AND username = #{user.username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AND birthday = #{user.birthday,jdbcType=BIGINT},

mapper.update:
update user
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=BIGINT},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
isDelete = #{isdelete,jdbcType=INTEGER},
telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
idNumber = #{idnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
